TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeInvoker extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides an extension point that can construct instances of a XAML type through techniques other than reflection and constructors.

span.span: Provides an extension point that can construct instances of a XAML type through techniques other than reflection and constructors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用途是能够进行可扩展的 XAML 类型系统、 架构和一个有效的运行时不依赖于完全 CLR 功能，例如 CLR 特性，通过反射信息和，依次类推。The purpose of is to enable an extensible XAML type system, schema, and a working run time that does not rely as fully on CLR features such as CLR attributes, reflection information through and , and so on. 子类被用作输入参数的 XAML 架构类的备用构造函数如。Subclasses of are used as input parameters for the alternate constructors of XAML schema classes such as . 你可以子类并将传递通过到基构造函数。You subclass and pass the through to the base constructor. 以及定义构造函数，你还必须提供替代至少的一些`Lookup`方法。Along with defining a for the constructor, you must also provide overrides for at least some of the `Lookup` methods of . 具有默认的实现。 has a default implementation. 默认实现到 XAML 架构类型的默认实现中遵循类似的模型和: CLR 类型系统用于实例化、 值和查找操作，包括使用 CLR 特性和，依次类推。The default implementation follows a similar model to the default implementation of XAML schema types and : the CLR type system is used for instantiation, values and lookups, including using CLR attributes, and , and so on. 提供基本的实例化的方法 () 和相关类型的方法其中表示集合、 字典或数组 (;;;;). provides methods for basic instantiation () and methods that are relevant for types where the represents a collection, dictionary or array (; ; ; ; ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现为空。The default implementation is empty. 内部调用此构造函数提供的值。This constructor is invoked internally to provide a value for . 有关子类化，请应或者使用构造的签名或提供重写调用作为基类。For a subclass, it is expected that you either use the signature for construction or provide an override that calls as base. 提供实现的默认模式 where不可变。Providing the implements a default pattern where is immutable.

span.para: 基实现，包括内部帮助程序调用ThrowIfUnknown。此帮助器始终引发情况下其中基于未知，其中包括情况的是。在内部，该基实现调用，并引发如果结果为。基实现不一定使用其自己实现。首先，将转换到尝试。如果此操作成功，调用进行并且该方法返回。否则，将基实现使用 CLR来调用基础方法，如从调用中获取此。在基实现中引发任何异常在此级别如果是。仍有可能，基础方法将引发异常时调用。其他运行的时异常还可能有如果不返回有效的结果。

The base implementation includes a call to the internal helper ThrowIfUnknown. This helper always throws for cases where a is based on an unknown , which includes cases where the of the is . Internally, the base implementation calls , and throws if the result is . The base implementation does not necessarily use its own implementation. First, a cast of to is attempted. If this succeeds, a call to is made and the method returns. Otherwise, the base implementation uses CLR to invoke the underlying method, as obtained from a call to for this . In the base implementation no exception is raised at this level if is . It is still possible that the underlying method will raise an exception when invoked. Other run time exceptions are possible if does not return a valid result.

The base implementation includes a call to the internal helper ThrowIfUnknown. This helper always throws for cases where a is based on an unknown , which includes cases where the of the is . Internally, the base implementation calls , and throws if the result is . The base implementation does not necessarily use its own implementation. First, a cast of to is attempted. If this succeeds, a call to is made and the method returns. Otherwise, the base implementation uses CLR to invoke the underlying method, as obtained from a call to for this . In the base implementation no exception is raised at this level if or are . It is still possible that the underlying method will raise an exception when invoked. Other run time exceptions are possible if does not return a valid result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应返回`null`用例其中此不是可写的集合或字典。This method should return `null` for cases where the for this is not a writeable collection or dictionary. 具体而言，应返回`null`用例其中返回`None`。Specifically, should return `null` for cases where returns `None`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你没有访问完全受信任的 XAML 类型系统，此方法有可能对报表 false向调用方的信息。If you are not accessing a fully trusted XAML type system, this method has the potential to report false information to callers.

span.span: is .

span.para: 基实现返回用例其中基于未知，其中包括情况的是。它还返回如果是。XAML 集合可能有多个方法，因为 XAML 集合可能可以支持多个内容类型 (请参阅，或请参阅有关的这一概念在 WPF 中的一个实现信息)。默认实现使用内部逻辑返回最佳匹配项上的签名并提供的类型基于。

The base implementation returns for cases where a is based on an unknown , which includes cases where the of the is . It also returns if is . XAML collections potentially have more than one method, because a XAML collection can potentially support more than one content type (see , or see for information about one implementation of this concept in WPF). The default implementation uses internal logic to return the best match based on the signatures and the type of the supplied .
